description: Explore the intricate relationship between Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) and trademark law. This article delves into the legal complexities that arise as NFTs influence digital ownership and brand identity, important for creators, buyers, and legal experts.
keywords: NFTs, trademark law, digital ownership, legal complexities, brand identity, asset trade, blockchain, unauthorized use, trademark protection, legal reforms
title: Navigating the Legal Frontiers: NFTs and Trademark Law
